entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
